trans-unit.source: Represents an OLE compound file that contains an encrypted package.
trans-unit.target: 表示包含加密包的 OLE 复合文件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope> has no public constructors.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope> 有没有公共构造函数。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope> is created by use of the static <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.Create%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.CreateFromPackage%2A>, or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.Open%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>由使用静态<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.Create%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.CreateFromPackage%2A>，或<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.Open%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Closes the encrypted package and the OLE compound file that holds it.
trans-unit.target: 关闭加密包和存放它的 OLE 复合文件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to close an <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法关闭<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />。

trans-unit.source: The stream on which to create the file.
trans-unit.target: 要在其上创建文件的流。

trans-unit.source: The publish license that is embedded in the compound file.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入复合文件的发布许可证。

trans-unit.source: An object that determines what operations the current user is allowed to perform on the encrypted content.
trans-unit.target: 确定允许当前用户对加密的内容执行哪些操作的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> on the specified stream.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的流上创建并返回 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />。

trans-unit.source: The current user has read/write access to the new file.
trans-unit.target: 当前的用户对新的文件具有读/写访问。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="envelopeStream" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="envelopeStream" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="envelopeStream" /> does not provide read/write access.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="envelopeStream" /> 不提供读/写访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The name of the OLE compound file.
trans-unit.target: OLE 复合文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The publish license that is embedded in the compound file.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入复合文件的发布许可证。

trans-unit.source: An object that determines what operations the current user is allowed to perform on the encrypted content.
trans-unit.target: 确定允许当前用户对加密的内容执行哪些操作的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> and gives it the specified file name.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />，然后为其提供指定的文件名。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />。

trans-unit.source: If a file with the specified name already exists, it is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果已存在具有指定名称的文件，则覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The current user has read/write access to the file.
trans-unit.target: 当前的用户对该文件具有读/写访问。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="envelopeFileName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="envelopeFileName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> that uses an existing unencrypted package as the source of its content.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回将现有未加密的包用作其内容的源的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.CreateFromPackage%2A> method to instantiate an <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.CreateFromPackage%2A>方法可实例化<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>。

trans-unit.source: The stream on which to create the file.
trans-unit.target: 要在其上创建文件的流。

trans-unit.source: The stream representing the existing unencrypted package.
trans-unit.target: 表示现有未加密的包的流。

trans-unit.source: The publish license that is embedded in the compound file.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入复合文件的发布许可证。

trans-unit.source: An object that determines what operations the current user is allowed to perform on the encrypted content.
trans-unit.target: 确定允许当前用户对加密的内容执行哪些操作的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> (on the specified stream) that uses the specified unencrypted package as its content.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回将指定的未加密的包用作其内容的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />（在指定的流上）。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />。

trans-unit.source: The current user has read/write access to the new file.
trans-unit.target: 当前的用户对新的文件具有读/写访问。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.CreateFromPackage%2A> method to instantiate an <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.CreateFromPackage%2A>方法可实例化<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="envelopeStream" /> or <paramref name="packageStream" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="envelopeStream" /> 或 <paramref name="packageStream" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="envelopeStream" /> does not provide read/write access.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="envelopeStream" /> 不提供读/写访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The name of the OLE compound file.
trans-unit.target: OLE 复合文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The stream representing the existing unencrypted package.
trans-unit.target: 表示现有未加密的包的流。

trans-unit.source: The publish license that is embedded in the compound file.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入复合文件的发布许可证。

trans-unit.source: An object that determines what operations the current user is allowed to perform on the encrypted content.
trans-unit.target: 确定允许当前用户对加密的内容执行哪些操作的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> that uses the specified unencrypted package as its content, and gives it the specified file name.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回将指定的未加密的包用作其内容的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />，然后为其提供指定的文件名。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />。

trans-unit.source: If a file with the specified name already exists, it is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果已存在具有指定名称的文件，则覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The current user has read/write access to the file.
trans-unit.target: 当前的用户对该文件具有读/写访问。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.CreateFromPackage%2A> method to instantiate an <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.CreateFromPackage%2A>方法可实例化<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="envelopeFileName" /> or <paramref name="packageStream" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="envelopeFileName" /> 或 <paramref name="packageStream" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> 占用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.Dispose%2A> when finished with a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.Dispose%2A>时已完成，但<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.Dispose%2A> 方法使 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope> 处于不可用状态。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在调用<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.Dispose%2A>，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>占用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.Dispose%2A> 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope> object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope> 对象的 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope>引用。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the file was opened with access to read, write, or both.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示文件是以读访问权限、写访问权限，还是以读写访问权限打开的。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> value that was used to open the file.
trans-unit.target: 用于打开文件的 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Flush the stream for both the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> and its package content.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> 及其包内容刷新流。

trans-unit.source: Gets the encrypted package inside the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> 内部的加密包。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> in the envelope.
trans-unit.target: 封包中的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the file is an OLE compound file with an encrypted package stream
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示文件是否为具有加密包流的 OLE 复合文件。

trans-unit.source: The stream that is tested.
trans-unit.target: 所测试的流。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the specified stream is an OLE compound file with an encrypted package stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示指定的流是否为具有加密包流的 OLE 复合文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified stream is an OLE compound file with an encrypted package stream; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的流是具有加密包流的 OLE 复合文件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stream" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stream" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The file that is tested.
trans-unit.target: 所测试的文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the specified file is an OLE compound file with an encrypted package stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示指定的文件是否为具有加密包流的 OLE 复合文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified file is an OLE compound file with an encrypted package stream; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的文件是具有加密包流的 OLE 复合文件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to test for encryption.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法来测试加密。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fileName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fileName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Opens the encrypted package in an OLE compound file.
trans-unit.target: 打开 OLE 复合文件中的加密包。

trans-unit.source: The stream containing the encrypted package.
trans-unit.target: 包含加密包的流。

trans-unit.source: Open the encrypted package in the specified stream.
trans-unit.target: 打开指定流中的加密包。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> that is opened.
trans-unit.target: 打开的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />。

trans-unit.source: The stream must have an encrypted package.
trans-unit.target: 流必须具有加密的包。

trans-unit.source: The file containing the encrypted package.
trans-unit.target: 包含加密包的文件。

trans-unit.source: Open the encrypted package in the specified file as read only and unshared.
trans-unit.target: 以只读和非共享方式打开指定文件中的加密包。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> that is opened.
trans-unit.target: 打开的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />。

trans-unit.source: The file must have an encrypted package.
trans-unit.target: 文件必须具有加密的包。

trans-unit.source: The opened file is read only and unshared.
trans-unit.target: 打开的文件是只读和取消共享。

trans-unit.source: The file containing the encrypted package.
trans-unit.target: 包含加密包的文件。

trans-unit.source: The type of access.
trans-unit.target: 访问类型。

trans-unit.source: Open the encrypted package in the specified file as unshared and with the specified access.
trans-unit.target: 以非共享方式使用指定的访问权限打开指定文件中的加密包。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> that is opened.
trans-unit.target: 打开的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />。

trans-unit.source: The file must have an encrypted package.
trans-unit.target: 文件必须具有加密的包。

trans-unit.source: The opened file is unshared.
trans-unit.target: 非共享行打开的文件。

trans-unit.source: The file containing the encrypted package.
trans-unit.target: 包含加密包的文件。

trans-unit.source: The type of access.
trans-unit.target: 访问类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of sharing.
trans-unit.target: 共享的类型。

trans-unit.source: Open the encrypted package in the specified file and gives it the specified access and sharing.
trans-unit.target: 打开指定文件中的加密包，并为其提供指定的访问权限和共享属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> that is opened.
trans-unit.target: 打开的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />。

trans-unit.source: The file must have an encrypted package.
trans-unit.target: 文件必须具有加密的包。

trans-unit.source: Gets the core package properties (such as Title and Subject) of the rights managed document.
trans-unit.target: 获取权限管理文档的核心包属性（如，Title 和 Subject）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties" /> for the package.
trans-unit.target: 包的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties" />。

trans-unit.source: These core properties are stored in the standard OLE property streams (\005SummaryInformation and \005DocumentSummaryInformation).
trans-unit.target: 这些核心属性存储在标准 OLE 属性流 （\005SummaryInformation 和 \005DocumentSummaryInformation）。

trans-unit.source: The core properties are also stored in the package itself.
trans-unit.target: 核心属性也存储在包本身。

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of the application to keep the two sets of properties synchronized.
trans-unit.target: 它负责要保持同步的属性的两个集的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rights management information stored in the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" />; specifically, the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense" /> and the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense" />s stored in the OLE compound file that embodies the rights-management protected package
trans-unit.target: 获取存储在 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope" /> 中的权限管理信息；具体而言，即存储在包含权限管理保护包的 OLE 复合文件中的 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.PublishLicense" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.RightsManagementInformation" /> for the package.
trans-unit.target: 包的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.RightsManagementInformation" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to obtain <xref:System.IO.Packaging.RightsManagementInformation> for an encrypted package by use the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.RightsManagementInformation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何获取<xref:System.IO.Packaging.RightsManagementInformation>为通过使用加密包<xref:System.IO.Packaging.EncryptedPackageEnvelope.RightsManagementInformation%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides access to the compound file streams outside the encrypted package.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，该对象提供对加密包外部的复合文件流的访问。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo" /> representing streams in the OLE compound file that are outside the encrypted package.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.StorageInfo" />，表示加密包外部的 OLE 复合文件中的流。
